      @GetMapping("/schema/upload") public String getSchemaUploadView​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Parameters:
      model - represents the thymeleaf model accessible through the view
      Returns:
      the web interface to choose a schema to upload

    • serveFile

      @GetMapping("/schema/upload/files/{filename:.+}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> serveFile​(@PathVariable String filename)

    • postUpliftAction

      @PostMapping("/schema/upload") public String postUpliftAction​(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, @ModelAttribute("schema") Schema schema, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Parameters:
      file - represents a schema to upload in GitLab repository and whose its representation must be added to a data set distribution into the knowledge base.
      schema - fulfilled class returned by the form
      model - represents the thymeleaf model accessible through the view that contains elements required for the view to return
      Returns:
      a view with a message informing about the successful upload of the provided schema

      Returns:
      the web interface to validate a downlift through its associated schema
